column5: Ok gang what's your prediction? (for what it's worth lol)
The groundhog can't get out of the hole. The snow has it packed in.
I use a calendar to predict spring. This year it says March 21
Back in the day they used to use bears instead of groundhogs lol.
I hope earlier than last spring.  We still had patches of frozen ground April 15th
The groundhog is never wrong! Six more weeks of winter and an 'early spring' or one and the same thing!!

That little sucker is only right 37% of the time so that means he is about as accurate as the weatherman (well a little better than the weatherman, oh to get beaten out by a dumb rodent, the shame of it)!  Best thing you can do with a nice fat groundhog is make a nice stew, sit inside where it is warm and watch spring come when it gets here.
Only 6 more weeks of winter would mean an early spring here.  Bring it on!
Only 6 more weeks up there would mean global warning has hit full stride!!!
Yeah.  Cloudy and raining down here this am ....   so how dioes he see his shadow ? Maybe if we turn off all the camera lights - we may get a true prediction.
In six weeks I will be sitting on a beach in St. Martin with a cold beer and my fishing pole, so I don't care what Willie said
I hear ya brother. I'll be parking my ass on a beach in Mexico at the end of the month.....Oh yeah and do a bit fishing!!

That little sucker is only right 37% of the time so that means he is about as accurate as the weatherman (well a little better than the weatherman, oh to get beaten out by a dumb rodent, the shame of it)!  Best thing you can do with a nice fat groundhog is make a nice stew, sit inside where it is warm and watch spring come when it gets here. I shot the little bugger last year.....didn't you notice this  year they used a ordinary woodchuck....LOL
BTW just in case you didn't know.........6 more weeks of winter would mean spring on March 16th..........sounds good to me, however we all know better.
the hogs in the slo-cooker here. were snowed in.
